data.title: Germany could spend billions of euros to convert pipeline for Russian gas imports to carry hydrogen: report
data.meta_description: Former Gazprom subsidiary SEFE also suggests it could spend â‚¬500m on repurposing gas storage systems for H2
data.text:
Clarity on clean hydrogen

Our mission is to deliver engaging and independent business journalism and insight to executives and leaders in the global clean hydrogen industry. We focus on delivering the news and analysis that matters, fearlessly looking beyond the hydrogen hype to provide a balanced view of the market, giving readers the knowledge they need to make critical business decisions.
